## Description {#details}

This struct defines the shadow mapping using the rule: shadow = (mem &gt;&gt; Scale) ADD-or-OR Offset.

If InGlobal is true, then extern char &#95;&#95;asan&#95;shadow&#91;&#93;; shadow = (mem &gt;&gt; Scale) + &amp;&#95;&#95;asan&#95;shadow
